attributes.action: Call a general election before leaving office in order to ensure the next Prime Minister has a democratic mandate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has happened in history. Power has been transferred to another prime minister mid-term before, but I feel that this should not be the case and that it is not healthy for democracy. Let a new leader lead his or her party to an election victory first.
